website_summaries.verdict: The Asics FuzeX Rush CM received mixed-to-positive reviews. Most runners agreed that this neutral shoe’s design was agreeable. They also appreciated its lightweight disposition and its versatile construction. But there were those who noticed a bevy of discrepancies which made the product less appealing. These inconsistencies in the design prevented it from becoming a go-to choice for those who desire form and function in a stylish package.
pros: The color schemes of the Asics FuzeX Rush CM gained some fans who stated that they were visually appealing
The color-changing nature of the upper unit’s chameleon mesh received positive remarks
The lightweight disposition of this product was lauded by most runners
People have used this running shoe for various activities such as casual walks and even weightlifting
As mentioned in some user reviews, the upper offers a good amount of comfort and breathability
cons: The forefoot section of the upper tore apart quickly, according to several consumers
Some people considered the midsole foam to be too thin and incapable of providing adequate underfoot cushioning
The toe box was deemed a bit tight, with some testers claiming that it caused some bruising on the toe-ends

customer_reviews.title: Not Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews I ordered a full size larger than my normal shoe size and they are still somewhat uncomfortable. I have been having a difficult time finding a pair of all black running shoes, so I'm going to hope these stretch to fit, since I believe going up another half size may be too much. At best these could be OKAY casual walking shoes. Running shoes they are definitely not.
customer_reviews.author: J. Worm

customer_reviews.title: nice comfy shoe, lightweight, runs narrow.
customer_reviews.text: shoe runs narrow like Pumas and i have narrow feet so if you have moderate to wider feet, definitely get the wides. May or may not stretch out we'll see. Also the seller i got it from sent me a customer return obviously as the laces were undone (not tied together like when its new) and soles were slightly dirty. Shoes still looked new but i can tell someone tried it one and walked around outside with it but i guess thats Amazon for you these days, all 2nd rate, customer returns, open box, blemished/refurb or closeout stuff sold as new.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Slightly more than 1/2 size too small. Still a nice shoe. *Update*
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of ASICS. Love the shoe. Knowing ASICS run 1/2 small I bought a bit larger, like my others. Well, the right one fit as expected but the left was like 3/4 too small. It stretched out after two weeks so it’s OK now. Maybe it’s because it’s black. It always irritates me when you buy pants or shirts the black color always runs tighter. ====== Update 8/14/2018 ====== Today, part of the coral-colored tread insert de-laminated. I'm noticing other portions of the tread are separating on the other shoe as well. Dropping from 4 stars to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ScottG

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a shoe with the perfect amount of cushioning for most purposes, especially if you wear orthotics. It is a very comfortable mid weight shoe that because of its color can be worn for most occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Decaryi

customer_reviews.title: My second pair!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. I have the purple color and now the grey. They are very light weight and I like the style. I just use them at work where I walk about 5 miles a day and for everyday casual. I normally buy an 11 but the 11.5 fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Runs 1/2 size small
customer_reviews.text: I wear ASICS exclusively because they fit my foot best. I really like the style of these shoes and they are very comfortable. However, I am an ASICS Men's size 8 or an ASICS Women's size 9 and these shoes run 1/2 size small.
customer_reviews.author: Keegan Kelley Harroz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Just like all ASICS I have owned, these are very comfortable and support my feet well.
customer_reviews.author: koatwork

customer_reviews.title: Perfect workout shoe!
customer_reviews.text: The best running/workout shoes I've ever owned. These put just about every single pair of Nike's I've worn to the gym to absolute shame!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Excitement

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, runs a little narrow and small
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, runs a little narrow and small. I went up a full size from what I normally buy and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: On the small side
customer_reviews.text: It is on the small side. I like the quality, look and feel. It is just too tight. Returned right away and still waiting for my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe and changes colors ! Will deff completely your workout look and performs great
customer_reviews.author: Sd

customer_reviews.title: Overall good shoe
customer_reviews.text: All around excellent show, slight squeak immediately with the left unfortunately, maybe just bad luck?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i bought the Kanmei running shoe as well as this ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought the Kanmei running shoe as well as this one in 9.5 each, this one needs to be ordered a size bigger as it is very narrow.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter - she loves them. Says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. White

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, not comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: This was not a comfortable shoe for me. Might be okay for others. Otherwise it looked great. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First bad experience with a pair of ASICS
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe made a squeaking noise straight out of the box and never stopped. The right heel would make a suction action when you walked on smooth surfaces. So it sounded like you had a suction cup on your right foot. I've owned a lot of ASICS shoes and this is the first pair I've ever had a problem with.
customer_reviews.author: Super Dude

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're too small for size 12 and too tight for regular fit.
customer_reviews.author: H Gill

customer_reviews.title: I always buy 8.
customer_reviews.text: I always buy 8.5 Size but this one small for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit right out of the box and on to the track!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look.
customer_reviews.text: Great look.. but almost a 1 size smaller.. too narrow. Can not return it cose im not at the USA rigth now.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Jarmar Mota

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not like these shoes at all. Unfortunately missed the date to return product.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Barker

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Fuzex Rush cm Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Our fuzeX™ Rush cm is the perfect showstopper with its color-shifting upper, sleek silhouette and all the comfort and support you need to get through the day.
feature_bullets: Seamless Construction: The use of seamless materials reduces the potential for irritation and friction caused by traditional stitches and seams.

fuzeGEL Midsole: ASICS newest GEL cushioning technology made from the fusion of GEL property and foam creates lightweight adaptable comfort, tuned to provide rearfoot shock absoprtion that shifts to forefoot bounce back.
AHAR Outsole: Acronym for ASICS High Abrasion Rubber. Placed in critical areas of the outsole for exceptional durability.
ComforDry Lasting: This lasting material features plush underfoot comfort while providing excellent moisture management and a high level of breathability.
Removable Sockliner: A sockliner which can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic.
